description: His full name is Uraltugo Noi Nueph. He is one of the best magicians from Alma Torran Magi and the best friend of King Solomon. He lives in The Sacred Palace in Alma Torran, sending new Magis to the World. He is as well the one who found the World and sent the people of Alma Torran there to live. He is the creator of Djinn system.
name: Ugo-kun
